question: NBA: Will the 76ers beat the Pistons by more than 6.5 points in their November 4th matchup?
description:
In the upcoming NBA game, scheduled for November 4th:

If the Philadelphia 76ers win by over 6.5 points, the market will resolve to “Yes”.

If the Detroit Pistons lose by less than 6.5 points or win, the market will resolve “No.” 

If the game is not completed by November 11, 2021, the market will resolve 50-50.

question: NBA: Who will win the Jazz v. Hawks game on November 4th?
description:
In the upcoming NBA game, scheduled for November 4th:

If the Utah Jazz win, the market will resolve to “Jazz.” 

If the Atlanta Hawks win, the market will resolve to “Hawks.” 

If the game is not completed by November 11, 2021, the market will resolve 52-48 favoring “Jazz.”

question: Will 'Eternals' get 85% or higher Audience Score on Rotten Tomatoes?
description:
In Response to Trader Inquiry: The Audience score that pertains to this market is the one on the main page of the resolution source, which is the “Verified Audience” score.

This market will resolve to ""Yes"" if, as checked on the resolution date, Marvel Studios' Eternals movie will be given 85% or higher Rotten Tomatoes' Audience Score, and ""No"" otherwise.

The resolution source (Audience Score rating at Rotten Tomatoes' movie profile: https://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/eternals) for this market will be checked on the resolution date - November 8 at 12:00 PM ET.

If for any reason the resolution data is unavailable, the resolution source will be checked every 6 hours, until the actual data is available.

If the data is not available on the resolution source by November 15, 2021, 12:00 PM ET, this market will resolve to 50/50.

---------------
Eternals is a 2021 American epic superhero film based on the Marvel Comics race of the same name. Produced by Marvel Studios and distributed by Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures, it is the 26th film in the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU).

Eternals will be released theatrically in the United States on November 5, 2021.

Rotten Tomatoes' Audience Score is the percentage of its users who rated a movie 3.5 stars or higher.

question: Will the bipartisan infrastructure bill become law by November 11, 2021?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” If H.R.3684 has “Become Law” (according to https://www.congress.gov/bill/117th-congress/house-bill/3684) by November 11, 2021, at 12:00 PM ET, and “No” otherwise. 

Credible news reports will be sufficient if the primary source is not updated by the resolution time.

question: Who will win 9th round of FIDE Chess.com Grand Swiss Open: Alireza Firouzja vs. Fabiano Caruana?
description:
This is a market on who will win in the FIDE Chess.com Grand Swiss Open Round 9 match-up between GM Alireza Firouzja (France) and GM Fabiano Caruana (USA), scheduled to take place on November 5, 2021. 

The market will resolve to “Firouzja” if Alireza Firouzja wins, or “Caruana” if Fabiano Caruana wins. If the match is a draw, the market will resolve 50/50.

If the match is postponed to a day on or before November 12, 2021, the same market conditions will apply. If the match is postponed to a day after November 12, 2021, or is cancelled altogether, the market will resolve 50/50.
